<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Viper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3202)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The giant viper's fangs are a frightening sight, with injection tubes as long as daggers. The sheer amount of venom injected by a giant viper can cause severe blood clotting and leave a victim utterly drained of vitality.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Giant_Viper.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Giant Viper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3202)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 317 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 26

</row>

**Coiled Strike** <actions string="Reaction" /> As [Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48), but the snake can use this reaction only if it's Coiled.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +11 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing plus giant viper venom

**Coil** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant viper uses an action to coil itself. While Coiled, the reach of its fangs is 10 feet and it has the [Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48) reaction. After the giant viper Strikes with its fangs, it becomes uncoiled.

**Giant Viper Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68)

</column>
